lyrics:
3 contributorsfather in you lyricsintro
oh oh oh
oh oh
oh oh
can i talk to you baby

verse 1
when i was a little girl i didnt have a father
and thats why im leanin on you
when i was a baby i didnt get a hug from daddy
thats why i need a hug from you
oh its not easy and i thank you for putting up with me
when you dont have a daddys love

prechorus
to say that you to say that im your little girl yeah
are his little girl oh why didnt he love me yeah
and give you the love i need love yeah yeah yeah
you really deserve and i believe i deserve it and thats why oh

chorus
thats why i need the father in you oh i need the father in you baby
thats why i need the father in you please dont hurt me please
thats why i need the father in you oh thats why really need you
thats why i need the father in you please be true mmm oh
you might also likepostchorus
oh
oh
woah
woah

verse 2
oh things got bad
to the point where mommy couldnt hold us down
and thats when it hurt me so much to see her

prechorus
to see her cry oh dont cry mama dont cry mama no
each and every night were gonna be alright thats what i used to say yeah
i said that some day that i would try to take his place oh
but it was too hard it was so hard tryna be a man not a woman and thats why i need the father in you

chorus
thats why i oh i need it need the father in you im puttin my trust in you baby
thats why i need the father in you please dont let me down oh
thats why i need oh oh i i the father in you i need in the father in you baby
thats why i need hold my hand oh yeah the father in you

outro
because we never had one at home no no no no no no
as a little girl
so i understand why daddy couldnt be there
cause its so obvious nobody taught him how to be a father either
oh and im not saying this to reminisce on the past
im just saying this to make you understand that i needed a father
and this is my problem
this is why i couldnt keep no one
this is why i couldnt stay alone i was so scared i know
every woman needs a man and i dont think she understands
that she really needs a father the father in you my brother
oh
she really needed a father the father in you
when your wife is speakin fellas
pay attention yeah
dont ignore her oh no no
ooh
i really need the father in youembed
